item.title: Psion Netbook
item.description: Psion Netbook has one CF card slot and one PCMCIA card slot. Cards should be formatted with fdisk on linux to be type 6 - FAT16, not 0e - W95 FAT16. Otherwise it won’t read the card. My experience with CF cards : Card CF port PCMCIA adapter HP 16MB no yes noname 64MB yes yes Sandisk 256MB no yes Sandisk 512MB no no First boot Copy the NB_450UK.
